## toThousand() function

format a number to thousand points

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toThousand(n: number, digits?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | number | number |
|  digits | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The number of digits to appear after the decimal point |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

formatted string

## Example


```
// digits default 0
toThousand(1234.5678) // 1,234.5678
// set digits to 2
toThousand(1234.5678, 2) // 1,234.57
```
